desc: Founded in New Orleans in 1967, Dixie Holiday was one of the original feather pillow manufacturers in the United States. Now, we're back bringing you luxurious sleep from southern bedrooms.

layout.text: Since 1967 our pillows and linens have graced the beds of hotels worldwide. Brands with high standards like, the Hilton Hotel Corporation, sleeping cars on Amtrak and in homes worldwide. Sleep is the most precious self-care, lets make it better.
